alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 8:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Mississippi, central Tipton and Lauderdale Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 831 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bassett, or near Wilson, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Ripley, Osceola, Wilson, Fort Pillow State Park, Joiner, Bassett, Marie, Fulton, Ashport, Ft Pillow, Henning, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Garland, Evadale, Driver, O`Donnell Bend, Grider and Tomato. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and west Tennessee.
